video.title: Seirei no moribito
video.synopsis: Female warrior and master of the spear Balsa becomes bodyguard to Prince Chagum to protect him from his menacing father, Emperor Mikado.

episodes.synopsis: After rescuing a member of the Imperial family from drowning, Balsa receives an invitation to meet with the Second Empress.
episodes.title: Balsa, the Female Bodyguard

episodes.synopsis: After being hired to protect Chagum, Balsa gathers some supplies and plans to leave town. Meanwhile, Shuga decides to consult the Holy Sage.
episodes.title: Hunters, Hunted

episodes.synopsis: When Balsa is forced to flee from a gang of the Emperor's secret hunters, Touya and Saya begin to worry that she's gotten herself in over her head.
episodes.title: Fight to the Death

episodes.synopsis: Tanda takes the wounded Balsa back to his hut. Meanwhile, Shuga and the Holy Sage receive a letter from the Shaman Torgai.
episodes.title: Torogai's Letter

episodes.synopsis: Shaman Torgai arrives at Tanda's hut and quickly discovers the nature of the egg "Nyunga Ro Im" inside of Price Chagum.
episodes.title: Secret Plan, the Blue Hand

episodes.synopsis: As Balsa puts her escape plan into motion, the Emperor's secret hunters enter a state of deep meditation to determine where she is going.
episodes.title: To Die in the Misty Blue

episodes.synopsis: Balsa evades the hunters and takes Chagum back to Yogo so that they can keep a low-profile. Meanwhile, the Emperor is informed of Chagum's "death."
episodes.title: Chagum's Resolve

episodes.synopsis: When Balsa takes her damaged spear to a talented swordsmith, she and Chagrum must keep their presence hidden from a couple of secret hunters.
episodes.title: The Swordsmith

episodes.synopsis: The Second Empress reveals to Shuga that she believes Chagum is still alive, and she asks the star diviner to confirm her suspicion.
episodes.title: Shuga Thirsts

episodes.synopsis: Balsa still thinks Chagum needs a bit of an attitude adjustment, so she hires Touya to teach the boy the ways of being a commoner.
episodes.title: Soil and Heroes

episodes.synopsis: When Sara collapses, Tanda comes to investigate and forms the theory that the stress of her arranged marriage caused her soul to leave her body.
episodes.title: Flower Wine for Tanda

episodes.synopsis: Chagum gets ahead of himself when he challenges a Rota bully to a match in the Summer Solstice Festivals' rucha competition.
episodes.title: Summer Solstice Festival

episodes.synopsis: As the Summer Solstice Festival continues, Balsa finds herself challenged by a Kalbo warrior who harbors a three-year-old grudge.
episodes.title: Neither Human Nor Tiger

episodes.synopsis: As Shuga continues to decipher the documents from the secret tomb, Toragai visits the Knot and questions the water beings about the "Nyunga Ro Im."
episodes.title: The Knot

episodes.synopsis: Shuga finds himself trapped in the secret tomb. Meanwhile, Toragai informs Balsa and Tanda of Chagum's fate to die by way of the egg eater.
episodes.title: Untimely Death

episodes.synopsis: Shuga finally finds proof that Chagum did not die in the valley, but it may be all for nothing when Prince Sagum passes away.
episodes.title: With All One's Heart

episodes.synopsis: The secret hunters infiltrate the water mill, but Balsa and Chagum happen to be out shopping for supplies. Meanwhile, Shuga spots them in the market.
episodes.title: The Waterwheel Burns

episodes.synopsis: After racking their brains and exhausting their options, Shuga and the secret hunters determine that Balsa must be heading to Toumi Village.
episodes.title: The Ancient Village

episodes.synopsis: After the Takue villager Nimka teaches him the fate of the Guardian of the Sacred Spirit, Chagrum decides to run away.
episodes.title: Escape

episodes.synopsis: After failing to find Balsa, Chagram, or the rest of the crew at Toumi Village, Shuga returns to Yogo to decipher more archives.
episodes.title: To Hunter's Hole

episodes.synopsis: Balsa tells Chagram the story of Jiguro Musa, the man who helped her when her father was being blackmailed by the king's brother.
episodes.title: Jiguro Musa

episodes.synopsis: As Balsa recounts the story of Jiguro Musa, Chagram finds the courage to embrace his fate and begin his lessons in martial arts.
episodes.title: Season of Awakening

episodes.synopsis: Chagrum readies himself for the eggs awakenings. Meanwhile, Shuga emerges from his research with at least some idea of how to defeat La Lunga.
episodes.title: Searching for the Spring Equinox

episodes.synopsis: When Chagrum, possessed by the Sacred Spirit, runs off into the forest to avoid the egg eater, Balsa and hunters stay hot on his tail.
episodes.title: The Last Hope

episodes.synopsis: As Chagrum arrives at the Place of Celebration, Balsa and the hunters use Tanda's blossoms to ward off the egg eater La Lunga.
episodes.title: The Time of Celebration

episodes.synopsis: Good news reaches the palace: Chagrum has been able to fulfill is role as the Guardian of the Sacred Spirit on the promised dawn.
episodes.title: Beginning a Journey
